Package co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.table

Provides access to the system-level table Datasets available within CDAP.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
MemoryTable A Table that stores all data in memory.
OrderedTable Provides generic table dataset interface.
Row Represents one row in a table with a subset of columns.
Scanner Interface for table scan operation.
Table An ordered, named table.
 

Class Summary
Delete A Delete removes one or more or all columns from a row.
EmptyRow Represents an empty row (a row with no columns).
Get A Get reads one, multiple, or all columns of a row.
Increment An Increment interprets the values of columns as 8-byte integers and increments them by the specified value.
Put Writes the specified value(s) in one or more columns of a row -- this overrides existing values.
Result Default implementation of Row
RowColumns<T> Base class for defining a row with set of columns.
Tables Utility for describing Table and derived data sets within application configuration.
TableSplit Table splits are simply a start and stop key.
 

Enum Summary
ConflictDetection Conflict detection level of a table.
 

Package co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.table Description

Provides access to the system-level table Datasets available within CDAP.
